statements: SELECT * FROM robots
SELECT robot_name, total_score FROM robots ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, team_name FROM robots WHERE team_name = 'Team A'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM robots WHERE matches_played > 10
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE total_score > 100 ORDER BY total_score ASC
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name, team_name, total_score FROM robots WHERE total_score > 100 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT robot_name, team_name, total_score FROM robots WHERE matches_played >= 10 AND team_name = 'Team A';
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, total_score FROM robots WHERE team_name LIKE '%bot%' ORDER BY robot_id ASC, total_score DESC;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, matches_played FROM robots WHERE total_score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY matches_played DESC, robot_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM robots
SELECT robot_name, team_name FROM robots
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE score > 100
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE team_name = 'TeamA'
SELECT robot_name, score FROM robots ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT robot_name, team_name, score FROM robots WHERE team_name = 'Team A' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT robot_name, team_name, score FROM robots WHERE team_name = 'Team B' AND score < 50;
SELECT robot_name, team_name, AVG(score) as avg_score FROM robots GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT robot_name, team_name, score FROM robots WHERE team_name IN ('Team A', 'Team C') ORDER BY team_name, score DESC;
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, team_name FROM robots ORDER BY robot_id ASC;
SELECT robot_name, team_name, score FROM robots WHERE team_name = 'TeamA';
SELECT * FROM matches ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT match_id, match_type, match_location FROM matches WHERE match_type = 'Finals';
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_name, team_name FROM robots WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT robot_name, team_name, score FROM robots WHERE team_name = 'Team A' AND score < 50;
SELECT robot_name, score, rank_id FROM robots JOIN rankings ON robots.robot_id = rankings.robot_id WHERE rankings.total_score > 500 ORDER BY rank_id ASC;
SELECT match_id, match_date, match_location FROM matches WHERE match_type = 'Finals' AND match_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robots;
SELECT robot_name, team_name, score FROM Robots WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
SELECT robot_name, score FROM Robots ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT robot_name, team_name FROM Robots WHERE score > 50;
SELECT match_date, winner_robot_id, loser_robot_id FROM Matches ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT robot_name, team_name, score FROM Robots WHERE score > 50 ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM Robots GROUP BY team_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT R.robot_name, R.team_name, M.match_date FROM Robots R JOIN Matches M ON R.robot_id = M.winner_robot_id;
SELECT T.team_name, R.ranking_position FROM Teams T JOIN Rankings R ON T.team_id = R.team_id ORDER BY R.ranking_position ASC;
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, MIN(score) AS lowest_score FROM Robots;
SELECT * FROM Robots;
SELECT robot_name, team_name FROM Robots ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, total_points FROM Robots WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM Judges WHERE experience_years >= 5;

SELECT Scores.score_id, Robots.robot_name, Judges.judge_name, Scores.points_awarded FROM Scores INNER JOIN Robots ON Scores.robot_id = Robots.robot_id INNER JOIN Judges ON Scores.judge_id = Judges.judge_id WHERE Scores.points_awarded > 80;
SELECT * FROM Robots ORDER BY total_points DESC, team_name ASC, robot_id;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, team_name, total_points FROM Robots WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;

SELECT Judges.judge_name, Scores.points_awarded, Robots.robot_name FROM Judges JOIN Scores ON Judges.judge_id = Scores.judge_id JOIN Robots ON Scores.robot_id = Robots.robot_id WHERE Judges.experience_years > 5 ORDER BY points_awarded DESC;

SELECT Rankings.ranking_position, Teams.team_name, Robots.robot_name, Rankings.total_points FROM Rankings JOIN Teams ON Rankings.team_id = Teams.team_id JOIN Robots ON Rankings.robot_id = Robots.robot_id WHERE Rankings.total_points >= 200 ORDER BY Rankings.ranking_position ASC;

SELECT team_name, SUM(total_points) AS total_team_points FROM Robots JOIN Teams ON Robots.team_name = Teams.team_name GROUP BY team_name HAVING total_team_points > 500 ORDER BY total_team_points DESC;
